attributes.action: Change the law regarding banks shutting down customers bank accounts
attributes.background: Recently bank accounts of prominent campaigners have been closed without reason. This should only be allowed if the bank gives a contestable reason & should only be done by a court. Not by the bank acting unilaterally. The government must act because without a bank account, you are limited.

rejection.details:
We currently have the following petition open on this issue, which you might like to sign:

Require banks to give a specific, contestable reason before closing an account
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640488
